title: Fair Bears
description: Welcome to a world that’s always fair. Get lots of wuv from friendly bears who care. Be happy, be fair. Be truthful, and share! They’re the Fair Bears, and they’re fair!
quote: I’m Happy Ray! Be happy! And that’s an order.
altHero: Fair Bears sliding down a rainbow
alt1: Fair Bear, a blue bear wearing a cardigan
alt2: Better Bear, a yellow bear wearing overalls
alt4: Ray Bear, a red bear, shooting a rainbow out of a flower
